net.proteusframework.cms

Class CmsHostname

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.cms.CmsHostname
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, net.proteusframework.internet.http.Hostname

    public class CmsHostname
extends Object
implements Serializable, net.proteusframework.internet.http.Hostname
    Represents a Site hostname.

    Note: when mutating the hostname, you should update the site modified time. See CmsBackendDAO.touchSite(CmsSite)

    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setOutputLocalizedObjectKey

        public void setOutputLocalizedObjectKey(boolean outputLocalizedObjectKey)
        Set the output LocalizedObjectKey flag. Set to true to have rendered text for the hostname include the LocalizedObjectKey. This is useful for translation.
        Parameters:
        outputLocalizedObjectKey - the output LocalizedObjectKey flag.
